Who we are

Gliding raking system is a platform to rank the skills of gliding pilots. It is based on an algorithm that evaluates the pilot's performance during each flight.

The full algorithm is based on the ELO rating but the details of the calculation are not published.

It is assigned a rank that varies according to the performance of the flight, to get a higher rank you must have perseverance and above all continuous training.

The goal is to motivate pilots to fly but also to determine the degree of improvement.
